name: My First Edit
description: This is my kanban boards kanban board!

card.cardDescript: This is worth talking about, possibly?
Something a bit like trello has?
Why is editing text single line?
As a user I want a nice looking app please!
Since he is at my desk I will waste his time
As a user I want cards to look like cards so that I can see them for what they are
As a user I want to drag cards into the correct list
As a user I want to have horizontal lists.
